---
title: "Catalogue of the Art Exhibit at the Metropolitan Fair"
author: "Leanne Fortney"
date: "March 21, 2017"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggraph)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)

catalogue <- read_csv("~/Desktop/School/Clio2/Catalogue/Metropolitan_Fair.csv", col_types =  cols(
  Date=col_date(),
  Painting_num=col_integer(),
  School_Subject=col_character(), 
  Artist=col_character(), 
  Artist_School=col_character(), 
  Purchaser=col_character(),
  Price=col_integer()
))

str(parse_date("Date", format = "", na = c("", "NA"), locale = default_locale()))

col_date(format = "1863")

```

```{r}
catalogue %>%
  group_by(Artist, Artist_School) %>% 
      summarise(avg = mean(Price))
ggplot(data = catalogue) + 
  geom_boxplot(
    mapping = aes(x=Artist_School, y=Price))

```

```{r}
catalogue %>% 
select(Artist_School, Artist, Price) %>% 
  filter(Artist_School == "English") 
ggplot(data = catalogue) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x=Price, y=Artist))

```

```{r}
catalogue %>% 
  select(Artist_School, Artist, Price)
ggplot(data = catalogue) + 
geom_count(data = catalogue, mapping =aes(x = Price, y=Artist), 
             geom = "GeomPoint")
```
